AboutPage.title: FMH – For My Health
AboutPage.subtitle: Deliver. Restore. Daily.
AboutPage.missionText:
Deliver. Restore. Daily.

We serve children, single individuals, families, and seniors facing hardship by providing consistent access to nourishment, hygiene care, and essential items. Through direct delivery and compassionate outreach, we help strengthen underserved communities across Little Rock and beyond.

True health means more than medicine. It’s having dignity at every moment. Through consistent outreach and compassion, FMH provides food, clothes, hygiene kits, educational supplies, and seasonal essentials — meeting people where they are and restore strength one delivery at a time.

values.empathyText: FMH meets people where they are. Whether it’s under a bridge, at a shelter home, or right at their door step
values.communityText: True health means restore dignity — not just meeting needs.
values.transparencyText: Poverty and hunger don’t take breaks — and neither should compassion.
values.localImpactText: Serving children, families, and seniors with food access, hygiene support, and seasonal outreach.

AboutPage.storyText:
FMH – For My Health was born from a simple truth: health is more than medicine. It is food on the table, clean clothes, warmth in winter, and dignity in every moment.

Founded in Little Rock, Arkansas, by Sy’Viceeaa Hall, FMH began as a small outreach effort helping families who were slipping through the cracks — the working mothers skipping meals so their children could eat, seniors choosing between medication and heating, and unhoused neighbors often overlooked.

What started as personal deliveries of food and hygiene items grew into a structured, community-based system built on three words: Deliver. Restore. Daily. These words became more than a tagline — they became a model of compassion in action.

Today, FMH supports hundreds of Arkansans through food access, hygiene kits, educational supplies, and the annual “Warm Hands = Warm Hearts” Winter Initiative. As FMH expands, it aims to reach thousands, restore hope one delivery at a time.
AboutPage.joinText: Volunteer, contribute, or request help — restore dignity, health, and hope for families across Arkansas.

header.title: Our Services
header.subtitle: We make it easier for communities, volunteers, and admins to come together — ensuring help reaches those who need it most.

request.title: Request Assistance
request.description: Need food, hygiene kits, or clothing? Use our simple public form to request help quickly and easily — even offline.

admin.title: Admin Quick Entry
admin.description: Admins can log field requests instantly, tagging them by need type and priority to ensure no request is missed.

delivery.title: Delivery Tracking
delivery.description: From request to delivery — track every stage transparently. Volunteers can update statuses in real time.

volunteer.title: Volunteer
volunteer.description: Volunteers stay updated with active requests and statuses, enabling smooth coordination and faster help.

donor.title: Donor Support
donor.description: Donors can contribute directly or pledge recurring support — every contribution is tracked for transparency.

dashboard.title: Requests Dashboard
dashboard.description: Easily filter, manage, and export requests — built for simplicity today and scalability tomorrow.

cta.title: Be Part of the Movement.
cta.description: Volunteer, donate, or raise awareness — every action strengthens communities.

PrivacyPage.title: Politique de Confidentialité
PrivacyPage.paragraph1: Nous collectons les informations de contact uniquement pour coordonner les livraisons. Toutes les données personnelles sont chiffrées, stockées en toute sécurité et ne sont jamais vendues sous aucune circonstance.
PrivacyPage.paragraph2: FMH – For My Health fonctionne selon un modèle sans revente. 100 % des fournitures et informations collectées soutiennent directement les actions communautaires à Little Rock et dans les environs.

TermsPage.title: Terms of Service
TermsPage.paragraph1: FMH – For My Health is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit providing community outreach services. By using this site, you agree to these terms, including the collection of basic contact information necessary to coordinate deliveries and volunteer communication.
TermsPage.paragraph2: All donations support direct community outreach programs, including events, deliveries, and seasonal initiatives. FMH maintains a zero-resale model — 100% of donated supplies go directly to families.

Footer.description: FMH – For My Health · Deliver. Restore. Daily.
